src:
Solskjer: Nadam se da Partizan neće imati lepe uspomene sa Old Traforda
06 Nov 2019, 15:21 by Darko
Ole Gunar Solskjer veruje da će njegova ekipa u četvrtak pobediti Partizan i prebrinuti sve brige oko plasmana u nokaut fazu Lige Evrope.
Mančester Junajted je pre dve nedelje slavio u Humskoj rezultatom 0:1, a menadžer crvenih đavola veruje da Partizan neće po dobrom pamtiti Old Traford.
– Moramo dobro da počnemo sutrašnju utakmicu. Nadam se da Partizan neće imati lepe uspomene sa Old Traforda. Kada dobro počneš utakmicu kod kuće, možeš da igraš slobodnije, da napadaš i postižeš golove. Imali smo dosta mečeva gde smo dali prvi gol a onda smo imali korak unazad, rekao je Solskjer.
Menadžer Mančester Junajteda ponovo neće moći da računa na najjači tim. Pored Pogbe, Matića, Tuanzebe, Bejlija, Gomeša, povređen je i centarhalf Viktor Lindelof, koji sigurno neće igrati protiv Partizana.
Norvežanin je ipak uveren da će njegov tim iskoristiti šansu da završi veliki posao u Ligi Evrope već u četvrtak.
– Sutra imamo veliku šansu da se plasiramo u narednu rundu takmičenja. To bi nam mnogo značilo jer bi na preostale dve utakmice Lige Evrope mogli da probamo neke nove stvari, rekao je Solskjer.
Utakmica između Mančester Junajteda i Partizana se igra u četvrtak od 21 čas.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Solskjer: I hope Partizan will not have fond memories of Old Traford
06 Nov 2019, 14:21 by Darko
Ole Gunar Solskjer believes that his team will beat Partizan on Thursday and take care of all the concerns about the Europa League knockout phase.
Manchester United celebrated 0-1 in the Hum two weeks ago, and the Red Devils manager believes Partizan will not remember Old Traford well.
- We have a good start to tomorrow's game. I hope Partizan will not have fond memories of Old Traford. When you start the game well at home, you can play more freely, attack and score goals. We had a lot of matches where we scored the first goal and then we had a step back, Solskjer said.
The Manchester United manager again will not be able to count on the strongest team. In addition to Pogba, Matic, Tuanzebe, Bayley, Gomes, the center-back Viktor Lindelof has been injured, who will certainly not play against Partizan.
The Norwegian, however, is confident that his team will take the chance to finish a major job in the Europa League as early as Thursday.
- Tomorrow we have a great chance to qualify for the next round of the competition. That would mean a lot to us because we could try some new things in the remaining two Europa League games, Solskjer said.
The match between Manchester United and Partizan is played on Thursday from 9pm.
